name: adv-spotify-clone
description: 1. **React** - A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. 2. **Tailwind** - A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development. 3. **ShadCN** - UI component library for building accessible, customizable interfaces. 4. **TypeScript** - Typed JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. 5. **Zustand** - A small, fast and scalable state-management solution.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
